description.displayText: Isabel is a very caring person.She is a very kind co-worker.She treats her clients as her family and gives them a tender loving care.
description.originalText: Isabel is a very caring person.She is a very kind co-worker.She treats her clients as her family and gives them a tender loving care.

description.displayText:
Isabel was my mother's caregiver for many years until my mom passed.  The care that Isabel provided to my mother greatly contributed to her quality of life.  My mother was 96 when she passed.  Isabel was very patient and attentive, and she always put my mom first.  Isabel is very dependable and hardworking. 
My mother required 24/7 care and assistance with walking, taking medicines, bathing, dressing, groceries, cooking, light housework, etc. Isabel brought qualities and experience that gave me comfort in knowing that my mom was well taken care of.  Isabel became like family to us. 

We were lucky to have Isabel as a caregiver and would highly recommend her.
